title: Excessively long queues/ Matchmaking issues
body: I was waiting in queue for twenty minutes for a blind normal 5v5. At twenty two minutes, it kicks me out of the queue randomly, the client just slowed and I was back at the home lobby. Upon rejoining, I'm hit with a twenty minute leaver buster.  Anything sound normal about this?

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the PvP.net service is *fairly poor*, causing you to miss queue pops for match notifications, etc. This would explain the random queue cooldown time that popped up afterward. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as these issues are commonly caused by network misconfigurations that conflict with League.

Let me know if this worked!
